text: You are not associating your app to a user, you are associating an app to a portal, so you need to bind the token to a portal id

Is there any way to add / install the files of a CRM Card project to HubSpot without using a LDE? My developer is external and the client is hesitant to give them super admin access to the portal (NDA etc.)

Hi all, in the company we work for we are doing integrations with HubSpot conversations API, for a new requirement we need to create an outbound flow through the whatsapp connection that sends information with variables fed with information from the backend, such as OTP, Renewal date, among others.
Currently we have Treble integrated, but we want to know if it is possible to do it with HubSpot and has that flexibility.
Thank you very much
@channel it seems as if the embedded HubSpot form is creating a slow page speed load, is there anything that can be done to make this faster?
Uh ... when I search, this is being embedded by HubSpot because we host on the CMS. Anyone else notice this script is included about 100 times on page load ....?????
